detail_desc: Hipster briefs in organic cotton jersey with lace trims. Low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.

Sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, ventilating sections at the sides and soft inner shorts with a key pocket.
Flared skirt in sequined mesh with a satin-covered elastic waistband. Lined.
Flared skirt in sequined mesh with a satin-covered elastic waistband. Lined.
Flared skirt in sequined mesh with a satin-covered elastic waistband. Lined.
Ankle-length dungarees in a viscose weave with narrow, tie-top straps. Seam at the waist with a drawstring that ties at the sides, and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem.
Ankle-length dungarees in a viscose weave with narrow, tie-top straps. Seam at the waist with a drawstring that ties at the sides, and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem.
Sleeveless dress in lace with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and a decorative grosgrain bow at the front. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a scalloped hem. Jersey lining.
Dress in slub-cotton jersey with a decorative frill at the top, gathered seam at the waist and gently flared skirt.
Dress in slub-cotton jersey with a decorative frill at the top, gathered seam at the waist and gently flared skirt.
Leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a hood. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a hood. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a hood. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.

Bolero in fine-knit cotton with a heart-shaped button at the top and long sleeves.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a round neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves with frill-trimmed shoulders.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a round neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves with frill-trimmed shoulders.

Balconette bra in lace with underwired, lightly padded cups that lift and shape, double, adjustable shoulder straps that join at the front, elastic straps at the sides and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and two inner pockets. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slight shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.

Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with a chest pocket, fake flap front pockets, two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Cropped top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a cut-off, raw-edge hem.
Cropped top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a cut-off, raw-edge hem.
Cropped top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a cut-off, raw-edge hem.
Cropped top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a cut-off, raw-edge hem.
Short top in batik-patterned sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and sleeves. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, fitted jersey top with short sleeves and a visible seam down the front. Slightly shorter front with a knot detail at the hem.
Short, fitted jersey top with short sleeves and a visible seam down the front. Slightly shorter front with a knot detail at the hem.
Short, fitted jersey top with short sleeves and a visible seam down the front. Slightly shorter front with a knot detail at the hem.
Jumper in a soft chunky knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft chunky knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with worn details with patches on the inside. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button and raw-edge, cut-off hems.
Cropped off-the-shoulder top in soft fabric with smocking at the top and hem, and long wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.

V-neck body in mesh with appliqués, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, press-studs at the crotch and high-cut legs.
Slightly shorter top in waffled jersey with an appliqué on the front and print motifs on the back and sleeves. Gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.

Knee-length skirt in sturdy jersey with concealed elastication at the top and a slit at the back.
Short jersey skirt in a double layer at the front with an elasticated waist.
Calf-length skirt in soft jersey with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and elasticated waist.
Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist and contrasting colour print motifs.
Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist and contrasting colour print motifs.
Cropped top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and lined drawstring hood. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a raw-edge hem.

One-shoulder satin top with a stand-up collar, an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck and concealed zip in the side. One long sleeve with a wide cuff with covered buttons and a sewn-on tie, and a gathered seam at the hem.
Shorter, wide-fitting top in a sturdy weave with a sheen. Wide, tie-top shoulder straps, a wide flounce at the top and a rounded hem.
Dress in an airy patterned weave with a concealed zip at the back, long sleeves, seam at the waist and asymmetric skirt. Unlined.
